    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    Facet BankAcct_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:BankAcct_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<BankAcct checkNumber="999" checksAcceptedInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <PrivacyGroup optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <BankAcctName>Example String Value</BankAcctName>
    <BankAcctNumber authenticationMethod="SecurityCode" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
        <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
        <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Complete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Advisory" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
    </BankAcctNumber>
    <BankID authenticationMethod="MagneticStripe" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)">
        <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
        <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Incomplete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Application error" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
    </BankID>
    <Type accountCode="Example String Value" description="Visa" id="bankAccountType_1" listBankAccountType="Savings" listBankAccountTypeExtension="listBankAccountType_Other_Value" name="Example String Value" uRL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
</BankAcct>

      Example JSON

      {
  "BankAcct" : {
    "checkNumber" : "999",
    "checksAcceptedInd" : true,
    "PrivacyGroup" : {
      "value" : null,
      "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
      "shareSyncInd" : "No",
      "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
      "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
    },
    "BankAcctName" : "Example String Value",
    "BankAcctNumber" : {
      "@type" : "BankAcctNumber",
      "encryptionKey" : "KHC32198gt4",
      "encryptionKeyMethod" : "RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey",
      "encryptionMethod" : "Triple DES",
      "encryptedValue" : "5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc",
      "mask" : "xxxxxxxxxxxx9922",
      "token" : "AEGHV234AUD54367",
      "tokenProviderID" : "Shift4 (payment)",
      "authenticationMethod" : "SecurityCode",
      "PlainText" : "Example String Value",
      "Warning" : {
        "value" : "Example String Value",

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        checksAcceptedInd
        Implementer: If true, checks are accepted.
